sn35.240:1.1: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, kummo kacchapo sayanhasamayam anunaditire gocarapasuto ahosi.
sn35.240:1.2: Singalopi kho, bhikkhave, sayanhasamayam anunaditire gocarapasuto ahosi.
sn35.240:1.3: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, kummo kacchapo singalam duratova gocarapasutam.
sn35.240:1.4: Disvana sondipancamani angani sake kapale samodahitva appossukko tunhibhuto sankasayati.
sn35.240:1.5: Singalopi kho, bhikkhave, addasa kummam kacchapam duratova gocarapasutam.
sn35.240:1.6: Disvana yena kummo kacchapo tenupasankami; upasankamitva kummam kacchapam paccupatthito ahosi:
sn35.240:1.7: ‘yadayam kummo kacchapo sondipancamanam anganam annataram va annataram va angam abhininnamessati, tattheva nam gahetva uddalitva khadissami’ti.
sn35.240:1.8: Yada kho, bhikkhave, kummo kacchapo sondipancamanam anganam annataram va annataram va angam na abhininnami, atha singalo kummamha nibbijja pakkami, otaram alabhamano.
sn35.240:2.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi maro papima satatam samitam paccupatthito:
sn35.240:2.2: ‘appeva namaham imesam cakkhuto va otaram labheyyam …pe…
sn35.240:2.6: Cakkhuna rupam disva ma nimittaggahino ahuvattha, ma anubyanjanaggahino.
sn35.240:2.7: Yatvadhikaranamenam cakkhundriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjatha, rakkhatha cakkhundriyam, cakkhundriye samvaram apajjatha.
sn35.240:2.12: manasa dhammam vinnaya ma nimittaggahino ahuvattha, ma anubyanjanaggahino.
sn35.240:2.13: Yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjatha, rakkhatha manindriyam, manindriye samvaram apajjatha.
sn35.240:2.14: Yato tumhe, bhikkhave, indriyesu guttadvara viharissatha, atha tumhehipi maro papima nibbijja pakkamissati, otaram alabhamano—
